levels.description: Attack interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks hit <@ba.vup>2</> times, increases the activation rate of the first Talent to <@ba.vup>{talent@prob:0%}</>, and each attack pushes up to <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> surrounding targets away <@ba.vup>moderately</>
